code: import React,{useContext,useEffect}from'react';import ProductCard from'./productCard';import ProductContext from'../../context/product/productContext';var Products=function Products(){var productContext=useContext(ProductContext);var getProduct=productContext.getProduct,products=productContext.products;useEffect(function(){getProduct();},[]);console.log(products);return React.createElement("div",{style:{width:'100%',display:'flex'}},products&&products.map(function(product,index){return React.createElement("div",{style:{width:'300px',margin:'10px'}},React.createElement(ProductCard,{key:index,product:product}));}));};export default Products;
